short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
description: The department is looking for MSVs Tow Bars to be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal and 7 CFSD Edmonton by March 31, 2023. The goods are: 20 tow bars for CFSD Montreal, 10 tow bars for CFSD Edmonton, 15 couplers for CFSD Montreal, 5 couplers for CFSD Edmonton, 15 tow bars for CFSD Montreal, 5 tow bars for CFSD Edmonton, 15 tow bars for CFSD, and 5 tow bars for CFSD E
duration_in_months: We are looking to have the goods delivered by March 31, 2023. Please see the tender document for details
full_summary:
# MSVs Tow Bars

## Tender Notice

* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01011701
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: W8486-238913/A
* **Publication Date**: 2022-10-28
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-12-07T14:00:00

## Procurement Details

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the provision of MSVS tow bars. The items to be procured are as follows:

* 20 tow bars (GSIN: 4910) with part number DP8000NSC (CAGE 73T77)
* 10 tow bars (GSIN: 4910) with part number DP8000NSC (CAGE 73T77)
* 15 couplers (GSIN: 2540) with part number 080K1013A1 (CAGE 73T77)
* 5 couplers (GSIN: 2540) with part number 080K1013A1 (CAGE 73T77)
* 15 tow bars (GSIN: 2540) with part number 10A0043 (CAGE 73T77)
* 5 tow bars (GSIN: 2540) with part number 10A0043 (CAGE 73T77)
* 15 tow bars (GSIN: 2540) with part number 10A0042 (CAGE 73T77)
* 5 tow bars (GSIN: 2540) with part number 10A0042 (CAGE 73T77)

These items are to be delivered to the following locations:

* 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec
* 7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta

## Contracting Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence
* **Contracting Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A0K2, Canada
* **Contact Person**: Tanya Mckenzie, tanya.mckenzie@forces.gc.ca

## Trade Agreements

This tender is open to bidders from the following countries:

* Canada
* Korea (under the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement)
* Panama (under the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement)
* Columbia (under the Canada-Columbia Free Trade Agreement)
* Peru (under the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement)
* Ukraine (
